entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
